plop.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the sound made by something when it falls or is dropped into liquid
plop.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: The soap fell into the bath with a loud plop.
plop.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to fall somewhere, making a sound like something dropping into water
plop.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The frog plopped back into the pond.
plop.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to drop something, especially into a liquid, so that it makes a sound
plop.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: I plopped a couple of ice cubes into the drink.
